date.title: Date
date.description: When the workout occurred in ISO 8601 format with timezone

exercises.title: Exercises
exercises.description: The exercises performed in this workout

ExerciseLog.title: ExerciseLog
ExerciseLog.description: A single exercise performed within a workout

order.title: Order
order.description: Position in workout (1-indexed). If omitted, array order is used.

supersetId.title: Superset ID
supersetId.description: Groups exercises into supersets. Same ID = same superset. Omit if not in a superset.

sets.title: Sets
sets.description: The sets performed for this exercise

equipment.title: Equipment
equipment.description: Equipment used. Recommended values: barbell, dumbbell, kettlebell, cable, machine, bodyweight, ez-bar, trap-bar, smith-machine, resistance-band, suspension

category.title: Category
category.description: Body part or category. Recommended values: chest, back, shoulders, arms, legs, core, full-body, olympic, cardio

musclesWorked.title: Muscles Worked
musclesWorked.description: Specific muscles targeted by this exercise

SetLog.title: SetLog
SetLog.description: A single set within an exercise

reps.title: Reps
reps.description: Repetitions completed. Omit for time-only exercises. 0 indicates a failed attempt.

weight.title: Weight
weight.description: Weight used. Omit for bodyweight exercises.

unit.title: Unit
unit.description: Weight unit. Required if weight is provided.

durationSeconds.title: Duration (seconds)
durationSeconds.description: Time for timed exercises (planks, carries, holds)

distance.title: Distance
distance.description: Distance for carries, sled work, or other distance-based exercises

distanceUnit.title: Distance Unit
distanceUnit.description: Distance unit. Required if distance is provided.

rpe.title: RPE
rpe.description: Rate of Perceived Exertion on 0-10 scale. Decimals allowed (e.g., 7.5).

toFailure.title: To Failure
toFailure.description: Whether the set was taken to muscular failure

type.title: Type
type.description: Set type. Recommended values: working, warmup, dropset, backoff, amrap, cluster, myo, rest-pause, failure. Default assumed: working.

tempo.title: Tempo
tempo.description: Tempo notation: eccentric-pause-concentric-pause. Use X for explosive. Example: 3-1-2-0
